data.title: Make Your Gift to the Community Foundation of Southern Indiana
data.meta_description: Thank you for considering a gift to the Community Foundation of Southern Indiana. The Give Today button allows you to make a donation to CFSI
data.text:
Thank you for considering a gift to the Community Foundation of Southern Indiana. Through our secure website, you can make a donation to one fund or several.

Many of our donors choose to make gifts to the Community Foundation’s Community Impact Fund. Your gift to this permanent fund will allow the Foundation to support the most pressing needs in our community and is the best way to make a general donation in support of the Foundation.

If you have questions about making a gift to CFSI or a particular fund, contact Linda Speed at (812) 948-4662 or e-mail her at lspeed@cfsouthernindiana.com.

(* If you are interested in giving a gift to our $2-for-$1 match for the Lilly Endowment’s GIFT VIII initiative, please select ‘Community Impact Fund’ below.)
